title: Thoughts on how to be a great data scientist and an excellent leader.
description: Welcome to Learning With Data by me, Tyler Folkman. Chief Technology and AI Officer at Branded Entertainment Network. Passionately pursuing outstanding leadership, state-of-the-art technology, impactful products, and trying to help others along the way.  Sign up now so you don’t miss the first issue. In the meantime, tell your friends!
dc:creator: Tyler Folkman
content:encoded:
